channel.title: All frame IDs in quest tab (Including the lines names!) (In an array for you!)
channel.description:
[code=java] /** * The frames of the quest tab. */ public static int[] frames = { 663, // Free Quests 7332, // Black Knights' Fortress 7333, // Cook's Assistant 7334, // Demon Slayer 7335, // Rune Mysteries 7336, // Doric's Quest 7337, // The Restless Ghost 7338, // Goblin Diplomacy 7339, // Ernest the Chicken 7340, // Imp Catcher 7341, // Pirate's Treasure 7342, // Prince Ali Rescue 7343, // Romeo & Juliet 7344, // Sheep Shearer 7345, // Shield of Arrav 7346, // The Knight's Sword 7347, // Vampire Slayer 7348, // Witch's Potion 7349, // Watch Tower 682, // Members Quests 7350, // Waterfall Quest 7351, // Witch's House 7352, // Biohazard 7353, // Clock Tower 7354, // Digsite Quest 673, // Big Chompy Bird Hunting 7356, // Dwarf Cannon 7357, // Family Crest 7358, // Fight Arena 7359, // Fishing Contest 7360, // Getrude's Cat 7361, // The Grand Tree 7362, // Hazeel Cult 7363, // Heroes Quest 11907, // In Search of the Myreque 7365, // Jungle Potion 7366, // Legends Quest 7367, // Lost City 7368, // Merlin's Crystal 7369, // Monk's Friend 7370, // Murder Mystery 7371, // Observatory Quest 7372, // Plague City 7373, // Scorpion Catcher 7374, // Sea Slug Quest 7375, // Sheep Herder 7376, // Shilo Village 7378, // Temple of Ikov 7379, // The Tourist Trap 7380, // Tree Gnome Village 7381, // Tribal Totem 9927, // Underground Pass 7383, // Dragon Slayer 7459, // Elemental Workshop 7355, // Druidic Ritual 8115, // Priest in Peril 8137, // Nature Spirit 8438, // Death Plateau 191, // Troll Stronghold 8679, // Eadgar's Ruse 1740, // Tai Bwo Wannai Trio 11857, // Haunted Mine 8576, // Regicide 8969, // Shades of Mort'ton 6518, // Throne of Miscellania 10115, // The Fremennik Trials 11132, // Monkey Madness 12139, // Roving Elves 7364, // Holy Grail 10135, // Horror from the Deep 11858, // Troll Romance 12129, // Creature of Fenkenstrain 12345, // One Small Favour 12389, // Mountain Daughter 12282, // Ghosts Ahoy 12772, // Between a Rock... 12836, // The Feud 12839, // The Golem 12852, // Desert Treasure 4508, // Icthlarin's Little Helper 3278, // Tears of Guthix 13356, // Zogre Flesh Eaters 13577, // The Giant Dwarf 13389, // The Lost Tribe 668, // Recruitment Drive 13974, // Mourning's End Part 1 14169, // Forgettable Tale... 14604, // Garden of Tranquillity 15235, // A Tail of two Cats 6024, // Wanted! 6027, // Mourning's End Part 2 14912, // Rum Deal 15352, // Shadow of the Storm 15487, // Making History 15499, // Rat Catchers 15592, // Spirits of the Elid 15841, // Devious Minds 16128, // The Hand in the Sand 16149, // Enakhra's Lament 17510, // Cabin Fever 6987, // A Fairy Tale Pt. 1 18306, // Recipe for Disaster 18517, // In Aid of the Myreque 15098, // A Soul's Bane 18684, // Rag and Bone Man 249, // Swan Song }; [/code]
Of course, if you are clearing you quest tab, it'd be better to use a for statement.

item.title: All frame IDs in quest tab (Including the lines names!) (In an array for you!)
item.dc:creator: @Christmas_tree Christmas_tree
item.description:
@Christmas_tree wrote:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:8, topic:480497”][quote author=lurtz1230 link=topic=598730.msg4211253#msg4211253 date=1359578055]
Would be pretty cool if you threw these in an enumeration so that they would store the quest name and id as well as being to iterate through them all.
[/quote]
u sir, have my respect[/quote]

…an enum? That’s actually a pretty sick idea.

Read full topic
item.source: All frame IDs in quest tab (Including the lines names!) (In an array for you!)

item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:5, topic:480497”][quote author=Clawz fury link=topic=598730.msg4210313#msg4210313 date=1359433547]

Did you get these all manually?

i swear u can find these in any delta
[/quote]
You can, but I want to know if he wasted the time to collect em or not ;)[/quote]Yes, I got these manually. I needed this for my quest system.

Read full topic
